name: Terminal Hacker (itch) (Lay_Dee)
description:
This is a simple short text based game.
My first dabble at creating a game.
Even though it's very basic, it does provide a bit of a challenge in unscrambling the words.

Click the screen to play.
Press 1, 2, or 3 + enter to choose your difficulty level.
Typing menu always places you back to the main menu.
All words and commands are lower case letters.
